OxfMert248.Transcription:
falsenes I vnderstandehaues dreuen trw vte of landeand tort and
                    fort as sheuen þarowch þat law sal lose if ouer
                    cloþe
OxfMert248.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 54.
